articles.title: Gunning for the BMW GS: Harley-Davidson launches Pan America, and its headed for SA - News24
articles.description: The BMW GS rules the roost in the big adventure bike market in South Africa and globally, but Harley-Davidson looks to address the issue with its Pan America.
articles.content:

articles.title: Thousands rally in North America in solidarity with Palestinians - News24
articles.description: Thousands of pro-Palestinian demonstrators rallied in cities across North America on Saturday, calling for an end to Israeli attacks on the Gaza Strip as the worst violence in years flared between the Jewish state and Islamist militants.
articles.content:
